resources.string: Tap here to turn on bluetooth
Tap here to enable bluetooth permission
Audio record permissions are needed for recording features
Bluetooth permissions are needed for to get bluetooth device status
Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Microphone Permission in order to use audio recording feature.

Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Microphone Permission in order to use audio recording feature. but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".
Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Microphone and Bluetooth Permission in order to use audio recording feature.

Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Microphone and Bluetooth Permission in order to use audio recording feature, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable both \"Microphone\" and \"Nearby devices\".
Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Bluetooth Permission in order to transmit audio to bluetooth.

Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need Bluetooth Permission in order to transmit audio to bluetooth, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Nearby devices\".
To save audio recording, allow Mic to Bluetooth Speaker access to your Storage.

Mic to Bluetooth Speaker need the Storage Permission in order to save audio recordings, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
